H3.text: what town was martin luther king assassinated in. Memphis

A4.text: On April 4, 1968, at 6:01 p.m. CST, Martin Luther King Jr., an American civil rights activist, was fatally shot at the Lorraine Motel in Memphis, Tennessee.
